source.b72c3ef9: TensorFlow provides a collection of workflows to develop and train models using Python, JavaScript, or Swift, and to easily deploy in the cloud, on-prem, in the browser, or on-device no matter what language you use.
source.d76e7ee8: TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive, flexible ecosystem of tools, libraries and community resources that lets researchers push the state-of-the-art in ML and developers easily build and deploy ML powered applications.
source.b2c8c535: Creates a constant tensor from a tensor-like object.
source.6364894e: TensorFlow makes it easy for beginners and experts to create machine learning models for desktop, mobile, web, and cloud. See the sections below to get started.
source.09c3c6ed: Keras is a high-level Neural Networks API for Python.
